N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 580.10 - Community relations

State Regulations
(a) The unit
shall integrate its services with other services of the hospital and with other
relevant community services for purposes of providing comprehensive and
coordinating care. (b) The governing
body shall assure the availability of necessary services not provided by the
psychiatric inpatient unit itself. In determining necessity, the governing body
shall take account of social work services, clinical laboratory services, special medical or surgical diagnostic or treatment services, integrated care
services, psychiatric partial hospitalization, psychiatric outpatient services
and rehabilitation services, and care management services. (c) The unit shall participate appropriately
in local, areawide, regional and State planning related to treatment programs
for persons with mental illness. (d) Significant changes in the psychiatric
hospital program shall take into account studies of needs and resources in the
geographic area served by the hospital. Notes
